text: “Ndipo tamulangiza munthu kuchitira zabwino makolo ake. Mayi wake adatenga pathupi pake mwamasautso; ndipo adam’bala mwamasautso. Kutenga pakati pake ndi kumsiitsa kuyamwa ndi miyezi makumi atatu. Kufikira atakula nsinkhu nkukwana zaka makumi anayi, (akakhala mwana wabwino) amanena: “E Mbuye wanga! Ndilimbikitseni kuthokoza mtendere Wanu umene mwandipatsa pamodzi ndi makolo anga, ndipo ndilimbitseni kuti ndizichita zabwino zimene (Inu) muziyanja ndipo ndikonzereni ndi kundilungamitsira ana anga. Ine ndatembenukira kwa Inu; ndiponso ine ndine m’modzi mwa ogonjera (Inu).”
